entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
